resources.string: Do you wish to save your location automatically or manually?
Please enter the name of the city
This will allow you to save data from another location
"Now you can easily store the details of the weather of your location in just either by clicking the below button or the one at the top right corner on the toolbar. "
You can save the location based on the weather data either by clicking the below button or the one at the top right corner on the toolbar
